post.title: Vector DBs
post.summary: Just a list of vector dbs
post.content:
- Chroma (Clickhouse)
- Elastic Search
- Faiss
- Milvus
- Mongo
- postgres / pgvector
- Qdrant
- Redis / redisearch
- Rektor
- Vespa
- Weaviate

Then I started to compare them on [grok](https://grok.com/chat/daa86a5b-ec2d-439a-a4ff-76a4d5d73b38)
